imdb.plot outline: A Christian talkshow & webseries coming Spring 2014! Featuring Christian men and women whose singular focus is serving our Lord and Master by having meaningful discussions about the Christian lifestyle. Our purpose is to encourage God's people by discussing and LIVING out our faith in a biblical manner. Topics ranging from marriage, false teachers, singleness, cessationist and more, these men and women dive into the deep things of God.
imdb.title: Doulos Dialogue
